argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mvrf.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 2 |  | mvrf.v | |- V = ( I mVar R ) |
| 3 |  | mvrf.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 4 |  | mvrf.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 5 |  | mvrf.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 6 |  | mvrcl2.x | |- ( ph -> X e. I ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_mvrf | |- ( ph -> V : I --> B ) |
| 8 | 7, 6 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ph -> ( V ` X ) e. B ) |
